data.eml:eml: A new fossil Hybosoridae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea) from the Yixian Formation of China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yan, Zhuo, Bai, Ming, Ren, Dong (2012): A new fossil Hybosoridae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea) from the Yixian Formation of China. Zootaxa 3478: 201-204, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282248
